title: Joico Color Endure Violet Shampoo, 10.1 Ounce
description: Joico Color Endure Violet Shampoo is for toning blonde or gray hair. Contains a maximum level of violet dye load to ensure maximum toning and neutralizing. Tones haircolor immediately following any highlighting or blonding services.

title: L'Oreal Paris EverCreme Sulfate-Free Moisture System Deep Nourishing Hair Masque, 5.1 Fluid Ounce
description: Evercreme is the first sulfate-free moisture lock system that delivers lush 48-hour hydration without heavy coating waxes. Rich in natural omega 3-11.

title: Beyond Turn Up The Heat 1.5 oz.
description: Protect your hair from the potential drying and damage from heat styling appliances. Beyond The Zone Turn Up The Heat thermal spray provides protection prior to heat styling.

title: Sexy Hair Sexy Hair Organics Leave-In Conditioner Unisex, 8.5 Ounce
description: Made with up to 95% organic and Certified Organic ingredients, Sexy Hair Organics are sulfate free, petrochemical free, dye free and paraben free. Safe for the environment and fabulous for your hair. What it does: Light-weight formula provides hydration, prevents breakage, detangles and smoothes hair. Spray on towel dried hair and comb through.

title: Poshe Super-Fast Drying Top Coat
description: Poshe Super-Fast Drying Nail Top Coat is a new generation topcoat! Dries manicure completely in 5 to 6 Minutes. Enhances nail color for looks that are on the go.

title: Maybelline New York Eye Studio Lasting Drama Gel Eyeliner, Eggplant 956, 0.106 Ounce
description: The most intense line for lasting drama. Eye studio lasting drama gel eyeliner holds highly concentrated pigments in a clear gel base, so color is more intense and lines resist wear for 24 hours. Smudge proof and waterproof.

title: Joico K-pak Shampoo and Conditioner Liter Duo 33.8 oz Set
description: With the highest concentration of Quadramine Complex in its formulas, K-PAK delivers the ultimate in healthy hair. K-PAK products work synergistically to rebuild, reconstruct, strengthen and protect damaged hair!rnShampoo liter size: ?Begins the reconstruction process using a unique cream foundation enriched with Joico's exclusive Keratin Silicone Complex. rn?Gently cleanses the hair while enhancing its elasticity, strength and shine.rnConditioner liter size:rn?Reconstructs, strengthens and detangles dry, damaged hair with K-PAK's Keratin Silicone Complex. rn?Hair feels smooth, silky and shiny with vitality and bounce.

title: Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Daily Scrub, 4.2 Ounce
description: Cleans deep into pores and helps stop breakouts before they start. This breakthrough formula features MicroClear a powerful technology clinically shown to boost delivery of acne medicine, clear congested pores and speed treatment deep to the source. MicroClear and gentle microbeads work together to cut through oil, dissolving dirt and impurities without overdrying or irritation. Skin is left clear and smooth.

title: TIGI Bed Head Ego Boost 8 oz.
description: BED HEAD by Tigi EGO BOOST SPLIT END MENDER LEAVE IN CONDITIONER 8 OZBED HEAD by Tigi possesses a blend of Shampoos Conditioners And Styling Tools For All Lifestyles.  According to TIGI you must have a sense of humour to use their products.  Everything Needed For The Latest Styles Be It Curls Wavy Or Straight Hair Bed Head Has A Solution For You.

title: Manic Panic Virgin Snow
description: Manic Panic Classic Formula Semi Permanent Hair Color Cream is the best of its kind! Gives hair bold, brilliant color.
